  ],
  "abstract_text": [
    "<S> this paper is concerned with energy properties of the wave equation associated to the dunkl - cherednik laplacian . </S>",
    "<S> we establish the conservation of the total energy , the strict equipartition of energy under suitable assumptions and the asymptotic equipartition in the general case . </S>",
    "<S> + _ mathematics subject index 2000 : _ primary 35l05 ; secondary 22e30 , 33c67 , 35l65 , 58j45 + _ keywords and phrases : _ dunkl - cherednik operator , wave equation , energy , equipartition    [ theorem]-2 mm    = 100000 </S>"
  ]
}
